name: R4B-MedicationStatement-R5-MedicationStatement
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B MedicationStatement into FHIR R5

element.display: Record of medication being taken by a patient

target.display: Record of medication being taken by a patient
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement`

R4B `MedicationStatement.category` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.category` - category changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); category changed the binding strength from Preferred to Example
R4B `MedicationStatement.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.contained`
R4B `MedicationStatement.dateAsserted` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.dateAsserted`

target.display: Link to information used to derive the MedicationStatement
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.derivedFrom` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.derivedFrom`

element.display: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken

target.display: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.dosage` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.dosage` - dosage has change due to type change: R4B `dosage` `Dosage` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `dosage`

element.display: The date/time or interval when the medication is/was/will be taken

target.display: The date/time or interval when the medication is/was/will be taken
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.effective[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.effective[x]`
R4B `MedicationStatement.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MedicationStatement.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.id`
R4B `MedicationStatement.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.implicitRules`

element.display: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication

target.display: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.informationSource` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.informationSource` - informationSource changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)
R4B `MedicationStatement.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `MedicationStatement.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.meta`

R4B `MedicationStatement.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationStatement.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `MedicationStatement.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationStatement.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

R4B `MedicationStatement.partOf` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `MedicationStatement.partOf` - partOf has change due to type change: R4B `partOf` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R5 `partOf`

element.display: Reason for why the medication is being/was taken
Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken
active | completed | entered-in-error | intended | stopped | on-hold | unknown | not-taken

target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.status` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationStatement.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status|5.0.0 (SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget)
R4B `MedicationStatement.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `MedicationStatement.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationStatement.text`
